full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 66 of 197 2607 LCHVMAX2 Young - direct A. As accurate as possible, yes. Q. And you don't write down the questions that were asked, right? A. No. Q. You don't have something that looks like a transcript? A. Correct. Q. We don't have the words that were used and the questions that gave rise to the answers that are summarized in the 302, right? A. Correct. Q. And these were not audio recorded? A. No, they were not. Q. Or video recorded? A. No, they were not. Q. With respect to -- if I could just ask quickly, first about witness Annie Farmer, you know who she is, right? A. Yes. Q. And you interviewed her on a number of occasions over the last couple of years, right? A. Yes. Q. One issue that came up with respect to Ms. Farmer's testimony had to do with the boots. Do you remember the boots? A. Yes. Q. Just to be clear, the defense issued a subpoena for those boots sometime earlier this year, right? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016795

text_blocks.content: A. As accurate as possible, yes. Q. And you don't write down the questions that were asked, right? A. No. Q. You don't have something that looks like a transcript? A. Correct. Q. We don't have the words that were used and the questions that gave rise to the answers that are summarized in the 302, right? A. Correct. Q. And these were not audio recorded? A. No, they were not. Q. Or video recorded? A. No, they were not. Q. With respect to -- if I could just ask quickly, first about witness Annie Farmer, you know who she is, right? A. Yes. Q. And you interviewed her on a number of occasions over the last couple of years, right? A. Yes. Q. One issue that came up with respect to Ms. Farmer's testimony had to do with the boots. Do you remember the boots? A. Yes. Q. Just to be clear, the defense issued a subpoena for those boots sometime earlier this year, right?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
